query.prompt:
For each row in the table, fill in columns 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 with the direct translation of column 1.
| Esperanto | English | Italian | Latin | French | German | Ancient Greek | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | en | | | | | | | | la | | | | | | | | mezo | | | | | | | | de | | | | | | | | la | | | | | | | | vojo | | | | | | | | de | | | | | | | | nia | | | | | | | | vivo | | | | | | | | mi | | | | | | | | trovi | | | | | | | | mi | | | | | | | | en | | | | | | | | malluma | | | | | | | | arbaro | | | | | | | | ĉar | | | | | | | | la | | | | | | | | rekta | | | | | | | | vojo | | | | | | | | esti | | | | | | | | perdita | | | | | | |
